posts.name: alperenyurt
posts.cooked:
Hi! Im Alperen and this my second year in FRC. I love drawing robot cads and desining systems so much.

I really want to see how it was your first cad and last cad. Show it with two photos.

posts.name: david
posts.cooked:
Two photos will be a bit hard, so I’ll just have a before and after: Before: 1st year in FRC image 911×691 97.2 KB image 838×867 70 KB image 1144×685 68.8 KB After: Junior year FRC (solo cad, both within the first four weeks of the season) image 693×850 81.8 KB image 854×981 58.5 KB

Although solo cad is extremely fun, and I think it’s efficient, I’m working on a design guide alongside 1-1 training to have a few people be involved next season and in the off-season.

posts.name: alperenyurt
posts.cooked: omg whitch is your rookie season? 2011?

posts.name: david
posts.cooked: My first season was 2020, I joined in 8th grade but the 2011 game was my first project. Had absolutely no clue how anything worked back then so the cad was a mess lol.
